price: 63.Waxay (malaa’igtii) yidhaahdeen: Mayee waxaanu kuula nimid waxay ka doodayeen.
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ جِئۡنَٰكَ بِمَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَمۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal ji'nāka bimā kānū fīhi yamtarūna
